website_summaries.verdict: A good size for ATVs and small trailers, this lock is a good visual deterrent and will stop amateurs. More determined thieves, however, may be successful.
pros: PVC coated clamp will not scratch or damage rims
cons: Can snap if you drive off with it attached

customer_reviews.title: Good Deterrent
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my trailer. The tires on the trailer are larger than normal and this still fits around it. The trailer is parked outside of our cabin and we get up there about once a month. So far it is still parked where we left it so I think it is doing a good job of deterrence.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Good transaction and product!
customer_reviews.text: The clamps arrived quickly and are sturdy. It was a little small for one of my trailers, but I'm sure will discourage and thieves! We've had several trailer thefts in my neighborhood, so I am hoping mine won't be among them.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: This appears to be a great lock. It is heavy and well made but ...
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be a great lock. It is heavy and well made but I guess the test will be if the thieves can't get past it. I bought it because we had several ATVs stolen at my hunting camp.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Johnson

customer_reviews.title: VISUAL DETERRENT
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased a teardrop trailer and this is the perfect addition to the security for our tiny trailer! Not only is it simple to use, but it is a "can't be missed" visual deterrent to thieves. This with our "tow ball lock" gives us peace of mind for our investment.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi T

customer_reviews.title: Good security at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the tire clamp mostly as a deterrent, and as far as I can tell it's working very well. No delays in shipping, it is very easy to use, solid construction, and the bold colors are very obvious from a distance. I'd say it's doing exactly what I wanted, and at a very fair price.
customer_reviews.author: ronworf

customer_reviews.title: Visual Deterrent Only
customer_reviews.text: For looks only, using it on a utility trailer. If someone hitched up and drove off, this thing would simply snap. I use it in combination with hitch lock as a secondary visual deterrent.
customer_reviews.author: Vinny

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional value and must have for trailer owners!
customer_reviews.text: I think this s a must for parked trailers with valuables enclosed. We use for our small camping trailer. Works like as charm! No one is get anywhere with this thing on the tire! Also super easy to use! Overall very pleased with my purchase! 😃😃
customer_reviews.author: Alicia MTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: this worked for my boat trailer but was not larger enough to fit my car hauling trailer. This was an error on my end and not the manufacturer. the locking mechanism works great and they provided plenty of keys to put on my spare key rings,
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: as described and seems to be good quality. It fit my 15 inch trailer tire and worked well. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: BigD918

customer_reviews.title: Lock it and sleep tight.
customer_reviews.text: NIce way to finally secure my ATV and not have to worry about coming out into the yard and finding it gone. What works for the cops works for me -- put a clamp on a vehicle's wheel and it will stay where it is.
customer_reviews.author: J. P. Kraus

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy! Locks don’t work
customer_reviews.text: I received this item I used it one time and was unable to unlock the boot. I had to saw it off of my tire. The company sent me a replacement and the same thing happened. I want a refund for this purchase and I don’t not recommend anyone purchase from this company. If I could give this item zero stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Marimar Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Quick service and good product
customer_reviews.text: Received this very quickly. It fits around the tire of our camper and does the job as advertised. Good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. bought it as a secondary lock to the hitch lock.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Protection!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Worked like a charm! Got it out of the big box it was shipped in, opened it up, unlocked it and clamped it on my camper!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Price and and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to install, works great and at a very reasonable price. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Desinger1

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t stop thieves!
customer_reviews.text: We had this product properly installed on our camper along with a hitch coupler lock. Thieves we able to drive off with the lock still attacked. They drove several blocks with it attached before it snapped and fell off in the road. Do not rely on this product to keep your trailer safe.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Yung Wyss

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: A must have anything can be removed if they want it bad enough, theives will pass your trailer upwith these installed
customer_reviews.author: brakeman

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and just as described. Easy to use, and very effective deterrent. We use it for a tow dolly and have had several folks ask us where they can get one. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great to lock up your precious RV when unhitched.  Bright and can be seen a mile away.
customer_reviews.text: Great to lock up your precious RV when unhitched. Bright and can be seen a mile away.
customer_reviews.author: VDT

customer_reviews.title: Good Transaction
customer_reviews.text: Delivered timely, product as described, rugged and worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so great. Seems well made and a strong deterrent. I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Great value compared to other local prices at golf cart dealers. Works great
customer_reviews.author: J Martin

customer_reviews.title: So so materials
customer_reviews.text: It seems like it would be fairly easy to break this. It does the job as a visual deterrent, at least.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good visual deterrent. With a little time and a little noise it can easily be defeated
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: A little clumsy to lock and unlock at first. Heavy duty as described. Fits different size tires and is adjustable. Not sure if having this or a club is any different for my car.
customer_reviews.author: Straightface

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, love how easy it is to take off and on my gator which I keep outside.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer branning

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: We use it on our camper and are happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley A

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and gives me a sense of security ...
customer_reviews.text: Came ontime, easy to use and gives me a sense of security when I’m not home.
customer_reviews.author: William T. Wampler

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Locking mechanism stopped working after one month. Very unsatisfied. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: mom of 5

customer_reviews.title: cant lock folks who illegaly park on my property in my state.
customer_reviews.text: Decent product- i think a wheel/pedal lock is better and more convenient to use for personal use though
customer_reviews.author: junni

customer_reviews.title: Great & Secure
customer_reviews.text: Quality item, fast shipping. Tried it out and it works great. Will be a useful deterrent when camper is left unattended.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: The wheel lock did not work for me. Measure ...
customer_reviews.text: The wheel lock did not work for me. Measure the width of the tire and distance from tire to opening in wheel before you order.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my husband purchased this and he says it is awsome and deserves the highest star we can give it!
customer_reviews.author: BusyBee

customer_reviews.title: Tire Clamp for RV
customer_reviews.text: The tire lock works as advertised, and is simple to use. Good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: LLE

customer_reviews.title: Security at last!
customer_reviews.text: Love these and they are easy to use. This is the second set I have purchased as I liked the first pair so much.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Trailer sequrity.
customer_reviews.text: Great price, arrived quickly as promised and was easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy O. West

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty and will fit on almost any wheel.
customer_reviews.author: ARS

customer_reviews.title: Came with no product information
customer_reviews.text: It did not fit on my tire for my Chevrolet Silverado.
customer_reviews.author: shiela valencia

customer_reviews.title: Fort Knox for Your Trailer
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Lock works easily and secures tight. No complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: KYkid

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but difficult to lock
customer_reviews.text: Use it on my golf cart. Seems substantial but is a little difficult to lock-perhaps it would help if the locking holes were a little larger?
customer_reviews.author: Swim the Sea

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. What a great inexpensive way to secure my trailer
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loves these, now he doesn't worry about leaving his trailers so much.
customer_reviews.author: sharon heiss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great I have them on my four wheelers. They fit great around the tire.
customer_reviews.author: lostboy

customer_reviews.title: It's a good deterrent for theft
customer_reviews.text: Have this on our pop up trailer parked on the street. It's a good deterrent for theft! Works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for and it does its job well.
customer_reviews.author: MHat

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Great communication with seller. My trailer is now secure. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: MJM

customer_reviews.title: Feeling better about our boat and trailer being safe at home ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got this a few days ago. Feeling better about our boat and trailer being safe at home and on the river!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl M.

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product for the price . Seems well made. Very adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits great on my little burro camper. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this tire clamp.
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy and not easy for thieves to remove or at least no one has tried yet.
customer_reviews.author: wendie oringderff

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a solid product
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my ATVs and I'm confident it will deter theft. Seems like a solid product!
customer_reviews.author: Renae Bell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product is easy to use, and give a nice piece of mind! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Mason Allan

customer_reviews.title: design is good but the lock breaks
customer_reviews.text: Poor lock construction. Used the key to open this lock twice in the first 2 weeks without issue and then the 3rd time the key got stuck and the lock is stripped. Wonder of wonders, it happened just a few days before the return window closes and still are allowed. Oh but I don't log in until the day after the 30 day window. Now stuck with a unless piece of metal.
customer_reviews.author: MRobb

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Items reciveed with out key so I can't use the locker
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, it fit my 14" tire/wheel and went on ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, it fit my 14" tire/wheel and went on quite easy. Looks like it would be a good deterrent. Someone reminded me a thief could just swap out your spare tire and still drive off. So I will maybe get lug nut locks for both this wheel and my spare.
customer_reviews.author: Will Pons

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: This will probably do the job. I would have given it a higher rating but it seems a little flimsy. Still it would be some work to get it off and maybe that would send would be thieves to some other easier target.
customer_reviews.author: N. Lira

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, well made tire clamp
customer_reviews.text: VERY substantial tire clamp! Don't let your wife get ahold of this if she is in a bad mood!!
customer_reviews.author: craigery

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't really use it.
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit my trailer, that had normal sized tires. I was not aware of this, so I can't really knock the product.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Nave

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it will work unless you have the tools to ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it will work unless you have the tools to just remove the wheel then wont do you any good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me. Too small for my tailor tires or my pickup truck tires.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit, didn't get all that I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't fit my F150. Maybe that is obvious but don't buy these for truck. Ordered and paid for 3 of them, only received 2. Used one on a trailer. Seems OKon small tires if you receive it.
customer_reviews.author: Carl W.

customer_reviews.title: Very effective lock
customer_reviews.text: This lock is highly effective and keeps my golf cart secure
customer_reviews.author: Janice c.

product_meta.title: Zento Deals Security Tire Clamp - Heavy Duty Anti- Theft Vehicle Wheel Lock for Car Trailer
feature_bullets: • SUPERB QUALITY - The Zento Deals tire clamp is made out of premium quality ABS to offer you the strongest, most durable and long lasting tire clamp. The handle is soft coated so that it is comfortable to carry. Most of all, the clamp has PVC coating so that it does not scratch or damage the wheel rims.

• PROTECTION SATISFACTION - The Zento Deals tire clamp securely wraps around your wheel and prevents theft attempts, towing, or any messing with vehicle. It works for cars, SUV, ATV, RV or even trucks.

• HEAVY DUTY - The Zento Deals tire clamp is highly visible due to its bright and striking red and yellow colors. The Zento Deals tire clamp is extremely durable, Light-weight versatile and easy to use. It is designed for a heavy duty and long term usage to have a good customer quality service.
• ACCESSBILITY - The Zento Deals tire clamp includes 2 keys for your convenience. If you misplace, loose, or break one, you always have a break up available.

• EASY INSTALLATION - The Zento Deals tire clamp is easy to use and a simple and convenient set up. No complicated installation required. Simply attach to your wheel, pocket the keys and walk away calmly knowing that your vehicle is once again safe.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars129 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
